explains: n. [心理] 矛盾情绪；正反感情并存

sentences.en: Many people feel some ambivalence towards television and its effect on our lives.
sentences.cn: 很多人以矛盾的态度对待电视及其对生活的影响。

sentences.en: And their ambivalence is never far away.
sentences.cn: 他们的矛盾心情从来没有远离过他们。

sentences.en: But underlying all of them was America's own ambivalence.
sentences.cn: 但是，问题最根本还是美国自身的矛盾。
